title: Activists at Seneca Falls Convention - objective

content.question: Which of the following statements best characterizes the activists who attended the Seneca Falls Convention?

choices.label: They advocated better working conditions for children.
They called for expanded women’s rights.
They supported Theodore Roosevelt for president.
They advocated the conservation of natural resources.
They endorsed assimilation of American Indians into White society.

content.answer: They called for expanded women’s rights.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
